articles.title: NASA unveils a new spacesuit for its upcoming moon missions: How is it different from older ones? - The Indian Express
articles.description: With the upcoming Artemis missions, NASA will be sending astronauts to the moon after nearly fifty years. Much of the technology that will be used for Artemis missions will be significantly better than what was available at the time of the Apollo missions. Th…
articles.content: For the upcoming Artemis missions, NASAs first attempt at landing astronauts on the moon since 1972, the spacesuit used will see a significant upgrade. Unlike the bulky and iconic suits in which Neil… [+4853 chars]
